elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Answer the following questions about the factual text "Politics and political parties".

elements.name: question1
elements.title: List the governing parties in Switzerland.
elements.correctAnswer: SVP, SP, FDP and the center

elements.name: question5
elements.title: What is an association?
elements.correctAnswer: An association is an association of individuals or companies. It represents the common interests of its members and attempts to assert these in politics.

elements.name: question6
elements.title: What functions does an association perform?
elements.correctAnswer: Associations inform and inform their members about political matters, influence government policy and sometimes negotiate collective labor agreements.

elements.name: question3
elements.title: What do youth parliaments do?
elements.correctAnswer: They represent the interests of young people and offer them the opportunity to become politically involved.
